questions.additional_info: When to Give Stress Dose Steroids:

calculator.name: Mark any statement that applies to the patient:

questions.text: 2. Takes any dose of oral steroids in the evening?
3. Takes < 5mg/day of prednisone equivalent oral steroids in the morning?
4. Takes 5mg-10mg of prednisone equivalent oral steroids in the morning?
5. Takes < 10mg/day of prednisone equivalent oral steroids in the morning?
6. Has been on oral steroids at doses ≥ to 5mg/day of prednisone equivalent in the past year?
7. Has only been using steroids (inhaled, topical, or oral) for 3 weeks or less?
9. Takes inhaled steroids at a dose of 750mcg Fluticasone or 1500mcg for other inhaled steroids daily?
10. Takes greater than 2 grams per day of class I-III topical steroids?

questions.description: Proceed to Surgery on current dose.

Test HPA Suppression Risk:

Early AM Cortisol 24 off Steroids
